O give thanks<S>3034</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; for he is good<S>2896</S>: because his mercy<S>2617</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>.
Let Israel<S>3478</S> now say<S>559</S>, that his mercy<S>2617</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>.
Let the house<S>1004</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> now say<S>559</S>, that his mercy<S>2617</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>.
Let them now that fear<S>3373</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> say<S>559</S>, that his mercy<S>2617</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>.
I called<S>7121</S> upon the LORD<S>3050</S> in distress<S>4712</S>: the LORD<S>3050</S> answered<S>6030</S> me, and set me in a large place<S>4800</S>. <sup>in distress: Heb. out of distress</sup>
The LORD<S>3068</S> is on my side; I will not fear<S>3372</S>: what can<S>6213</S> man<S>120</S> do<S>6213</S> unto me? <sup>on: Heb. for me</sup>
The LORD<S>3068</S> taketh my part with them that help<S>5826</S> me: therefore shall I see<S>7200</S> my desire upon them that hate<S>8130</S> me.
It is better<S>2896</S> to trust<S>2620</S> in the LORD<S>3068</S> than to put confidence<S>982</S> in man<S>120</S>.
It is better<S>2896</S> to trust<S>2620</S> in the LORD<S>3068</S> than to put confidence<S>982</S> in princes<S>5081</S>.
All nations<S>1471</S> compassed me about<S>5437</S>: but in the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> will I destroy<S>4135</S> them. <sup>destroy: Heb. cut them off</sup>
They compassed me about<S>5437</S>; yea, they compassed me about<S>5437</S>: but in the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> I will destroy<S>4135</S> them.
They compassed me about<S>5437</S> like bees<S>1682</S>; they are quenched<S>1846</S> as the fire<S>784</S> of thorns<S>6975</S>: for in the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> I will destroy<S>4135</S> them. <sup>destroy: Heb. cut down</sup>
Thou hast thrust<S>1760</S> sore<S>1760</S> at me that I might fall<S>5307</S>: but the LORD<S>3068</S> helped<S>5826</S> me.
The LORD<S>3050</S> is my strength<S>5797</S> and song<S>2176</S>, and is become my salvation<S>3444</S>.
The voice<S>6963</S> of rejoicing<S>7440</S> and salvation<S>3444</S> is in the tabernacles<S>168</S> of the righteous<S>6662</S>: the right hand<S>3225</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> doeth<S>6213</S> valiantly<S>2428</S>.
The right hand<S>3225</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> is exalted<S>7426</S>: the right hand<S>3225</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> doeth<S>6213</S> valiantly<S>2428</S>.
I shall not die<S>4191</S>, but live<S>2421</S>, and declare<S>5608</S> the works<S>4639</S> of the LORD<S>3050</S>.
The LORD<S>3050</S> hath chastened<S>3256</S> me sore<S>3256</S>: but he hath not given me over<S>5414</S> unto death<S>4194</S>.
Open<S>6605</S> to me the gates<S>8179</S> of righteousness<S>6664</S>: I will go<S>935</S> into them, and I will praise<S>3034</S> the LORD<S>3050</S>:
This gate<S>8179</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, into which the righteous<S>6662</S> shall enter<S>935</S>.
I will praise<S>3034</S> thee: for thou hast heard<S>6030</S> me, and art become my salvation<S>3444</S>.
The stone<S>68</S> which the builders<S>1129</S> refused<S>3988</S> is become the head<S>7218</S> stone of the corner<S>6438</S>.
This is the LORD'S<S>3068</S> doing; it is marvellous<S>6381</S> in our eyes<S>5869</S>. <sup>the LORD's: Heb. from the LORD</sup>
This is the day<S>3117</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> hath made<S>6213</S>; we will rejoice<S>1523</S> and be glad<S>8055</S> in it.
Save<S>3467</S> now, I beseech<S>577</S> thee, O LORD<S>3068</S>: O LORD<S>3068</S>, I beseech<S>577</S> thee, send now prosperity<S>6743</S>.
Blessed<S>1288</S> be he that cometh<S>935</S> in the name<S>8034</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>: we have blessed<S>1288</S> you out of the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>.
God<S>410</S> is the LORD<S>3068</S>, which hath shewed us light<S>215</S>: bind<S>631</S> the sacrifice<S>2282</S> with cords<S>5688</S>, even unto the horns<S>7161</S> of the altar<S>4196</S>.
Thou art my God<S>410</S>, and I will praise<S>3034</S> thee: thou art my God<S>430</S>, I will exalt<S>7311</S> thee.
O give thanks<S>3034</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; for he is good<S>2896</S>: for his mercy<S>2617</S> endureth for ever<S>5769</S>.
